summary: Jan has his own night radio program where people can simply call and talk about own troubles. The station management does not share his compassion for lonely souls and think the program is ... See full summary »
cast: Roman Wilhelmi|Anna Seniuk|Iwona Bielska|Nela Obarska|Jerzy Trela|Grzegorz Herominski|Marek Probosz|Piotr Fronczewski|Jerzy Stuhr|Inez Fichna|Jolanta Nowak|Jan Hencz|Janusz Skalski|Andrzej Zarnecki|Bozena Adamek|Alina Aftowicz|Zbigniew Buczkowski|Anna Ciepielewska|Hanna Giza|Grazyna Halupka|Helena Kowalczykowa|Pawel Nowisz|Ryszard Mróz|Maryna Polak|Wojciech Strzemzalski|Jacek Strzemzalski|Tadeusz Teodorczyk|Malgorzata Wohl|Andrzej Wohl|Ewa Worytkiewicz|Wieslaw Wójcik|Janina Tur
title: Cma
